revised_title: Observations and Analysis of Nova Persei's Light Variations and Spectrum
tldr: This article presents further observations and analysis of the Nova Persei, focusing on its light variations and spectrum. The author, Sir Norman Lockyer, discusses the periodic changes in the Nova's magnitude and color, as well as the prominent spectral lines observed. The article also compares the Nova's spectrum with those of hydrogen, helium, and other elements.
